about_the_game:
Ballooni features the protagonist of the same name. Ballooni is on a mission to collect valuable coins across a series of challenging levels full of obstacles and crazy enemies to avoid!

Your task is to gather enough coins to progress, but it is not an easy task as enemies roam the environment. Along the way, you are solving small puzzles and earn rewards. Portals may be accessed and utilized to enter otherwise inaccessible areas of the map.

It is a lot of fun to hop on conveyor belts and floating platforms and you can shoot the spell against your enemies to freeze them in time momentarily or to banish them from the stage.

Each of the levels within the game has its own theme and distinct look-and-feel. You must learn to master the Tower of Bats, the Acid Flooding Pyramid with bouncing portals, the Labyrinth of Madness, and other levels to beat the game.

At the bottom of the screen a scrolling display encourages you along the way and offers funny tips and phrases as you play.


COMMON TIPPS

  • If your vigilance is exhausted, then you start the stage again with a little more vigilance. You will get noticed about also within the game. The "coach" will tell you helpful things.

  • For instance collect the letters in the correct order! Then, when the word is completed, your vigilance increases!

  • Decrease or increase the difficulty as needed. You have to be able to react quickly!

  • Beware of kRACH, Tennismorph, De Flurp, Black Tomato and crazy others...

  • By collecting the green coins, the enemies tend to flee. Ballooni then still loses some vigilance in contact with enemies.

  • By collecting the red coins, the enemies tend to hunt Ballooni.

PREFER to play with a GAMEPAD anyway.

YOU DON'T HAVE A GAMEPAD??? That is the keyboard support as visualized in the game...

  • Shoot spell: The key next to the left or right shift key/Shift

  • Climb ladder: arrow keys, w, s

  • Walk: arrow keys, a, d

  • Jump: left or right shift key

  • Cancel game: ESC

AND IN THE MENU...

  • Navigate: Arrow keys

  • Trigger button: Return/Enter, Spacebar

  • Exit game: ESC
